Cursor Types Test Page

Tests all interactive cursor types supported by MCP Comet Browser v3.0.1

Interactive Cursor Types (Should Be Detected)

cursor: pointer

Standard clickable cursor (e.g., buttons, links)

cursor: move

Movable/draggable cursor (e.g., React lead cards, draggable items)

cursor: grab

Grabbable cursor (idle state for draggable elements)

cursor: grabbing

Grabbing cursor (active drag state)

cursor: zoom-in

Zoom-in cursor (e.g., zoomable images)

cursor: zoom-out

Zoom-out cursor (e.g., zoomed images)

cursor: all-scroll

All-direction scroll cursor (e.g., panning views)

Non-Interactive Cursor Types (Should NOT Be Detected)

cursor: default

Default cursor (normal, not interactive)

cursor: text

Text cursor (for editing, not clicking)

cursor: not-allowed

Not-allowed cursor (disabled state)

cursor: wait

Wait cursor (loading state)
